title: MCLauncherBN使用帮助文档
author: zhh0000zhh
txt_content: em>该帖被管理员或版主屏蔽

replies.author: zhh0000zhh
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 zhh0000zhh 于 2015-7-7 19:36 编辑 

翻译由Yuki_Usagi提供，感谢~
Thanks Yuki_Usagi for translate this page.
This tutorial suits version 3.2.13.1219. Some of the pictures will be replaced when adding new contents.
Besides, versions which is higher than the above mentioned version will be directed to this page.
First of all, the environment the launcher has to work on is WINDOWS, it doesn't work with other platforms.
It supports Win2000+. It does work for servers as well, but this tutorial won't provide any help on it.
To 2000/XP users, if you can't run the launcher, download the .net2 runtime. Here is the link: http://www.microsoft.com/zh-cn/download/details.aspx?id=1639
Click "Download"
Select NetFx20SP2_x86.exe, download and install.
To Vista/7 users, you can run it directly as the system already have the needed runtime.
To 8/8.1 users, if your internet is good enough, let Windows download for you is a great choice. Otherwise download it manually. The related tutorial is here(CN): http://www.cnbeta.com/articles/181317.htm
Second part, Java
If you haven't install Java yet it will remind you to install it. If you download from the main page,
choose "All downloads" and choose version according to your system(32/64bit). When you are done, and if your
system's structure is x64, the launcher will add a new option named "Launch at x86 mode". If this
option appears, it means your system has both 32bit and 64bit versions of Java.
Third part, Lancher UI
About Skinme login, you can only login to MCBBS servers with this, also you will need a special version of client.
It is advised to use this special version: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-195422-1-1.html
About Twitch only login, if you are using cracked version and want to stream through twitch, read this: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-198946-1-1.html
2.Download the game
Download Minecraft
Download Forge
Download FML(Support from 3.2.13.1225)
Download mod
Uptill now this function just points to MCBBS's mod section, you still need to download and instll manually.
No automatic install function is planned, mainly because of the problem fetching BaiduNetdisk links.
Update Launcher
I don't think I have to explain about this... If there is any newer versions, the system will display "New Update", click on it and you will be directed to
Update page, choose newest version and click download, the launcher will do the rest for you.
Comments
You can find this from "About". Please don't use this to spam us, thanks.
Help
The future versions will display this page.
Part 4, debugging system
*Cough* This is the major feature of this launcher. No matter what, do it as the launcher tell you. It is not planned to add new rules. All updates
of rules will be saved on cloud , the debugging system will also be run on cloud. I won't read the logs if I'm lazy. Your logs will be safe if there is no hackers...
I may reply to all basic glitches, I can't help minor or rare glitches. After all this is only a simple log analyze system...
Last but not least
If you have got any questions about using this launcher, please reply on this thread.
If you have got any questions about error, please view this page:http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-119479-1-1.html.

replies.author: 一棵枫树
replies.txt_content: 忽然想到，像我这种因为网络问题只能翻墙才能获取游戏更新下载的人应该还是有不少的，可不可以添加对网络代理的支持？比如goagent啥的。

replies.author: zhh0000zhh
replies.txt_content:
一棵枫树 发表于 2013-12-24 00:46 
忽然想到，像我这种因为网络问题只能翻墙才能获取游戏更新下载的人应该还是有不少的，可不可以添加对网络代 ...
像国内部分运营商屏蔽问题，无需翻墙，只需国内免费代理服务器
.net框架下会自动使用IE的代理设置，也就是说只要IE设置了代理，启动器就能自动使用IE设置的代理。
至于goagent说实话。。兼容难度略大。。
不过未来或许可以考虑加入个修改IE代理的插件，不过得等启动器插件系统编写完（乐观估计1月份上线，或者2月。。亦或者15年。。。或。。。。）
此外bangbang的BMCL自带下载映像服务器，更新频率还是很高的，也可以试试~
我确实不好意思蹭他的服务器的说。。。

最后：建议你尝试修改DNS服务器，但不要修改为8.8.8.8之类被各种运行商劫持的DNS
试试搜索你们本（省/市）的联通/电信DNS服务器，通常可解决问题。

校园网，DNS什么的改了就不能用了。IE代理也是，改了之后连接校园内网会有问题……全局代理基本都有或大或小的冲突……最好用的办法就是指定有需要的程序用代理……教育网真是让人又爱又恨……

replies.author: zhh0000zhh
replies.txt_content:
一棵枫树 发表于 2014-1-11 14:16 
不知道代理插件肿么样了？

求代理呀……在IE改代理太麻烦了，每次更新游戏都需要打开IE改代理，下载完 ...
事实上如果用代码独立使用代理远比修改IE代理困难得多。。
目前的想法是改IE代理，然后退出的时候自动改回来之类的。。
不过貌似不太好。。不过估计很快就能做好了。
至于直接代理。。。
那玩意得把使用的所有httprequest全都拆成socket基础连接
重写所有httprequest，工程量略大，暂时没有这个计划

启动器是用易语言编写的。。。启动的代码就是这些：
命令行=#引号+“MC.exe”+#引号+“ 1.6.4-Forge9.11.1. ...
请不要发布与本人启动器无关内容，谢谢合作。


赤裸裸的挖墙脚！！！


start.bat的图标必然是bat文件的图标
这与本启动器无关，而且除了修改bat全局图标外亦无解决方案。

至于运行后游戏图标问题，检查启动器是否为最新版本，以及资源文件是否正常。

最后，经过测试，我自己用的没有任何问题。

PS:启动器没有任何调用检查，没有调用陷阱。

PS2:直接启动程序就行，不用写bat文件。

PS3:如此一旦启动失败，MCLauncherBN将弹出启动失败诊断等功能以及启动器主界面。
